title: President Rajapaksa participates in the Annual Kataragama Festival
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix By: Nalin Hewapathirana – President Mahinda Rajapaksa visited the Kataragama sacred area last night and participated in many special religious observances and annual Kataragama perahara festival. The President participated in religious observances at the Katharagama Kiri Vehera Rajamaha Viharaya and called on the Chief Incumbent of the Kiri Vehera…
